ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls

cookingTips: Unroll crescent dough carefully along perforations to maintain shape
Place a small amount of chocolate chips in each crescent to prevent overflow
Dust with powdered sugar immediately after baking for better adhesion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me create quick, elegant chocolate-filled crescents using store-bought dough.
